tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CapitalStructureAnalysis (
  company_id INT,
  debt_financing DECIMAL,
  equity_financing DECIMAL,
  total_capital DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Debt_Financing (
  debt_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  debt_amount DECIMAL,
  debt_term VARCHAR(50),
  debt_interest_rate DECIMAL,
  company_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Equity_Financing (
  equity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  equity_amount DECIMAL,
  equity_share DECIMAL,
  investor_id INT,
  company_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Capital_Decisions (
  decision_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  company_id INT,
  financing_type VARCHAR(50),
  decision_date TIMESTAMP,
  decision_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE DebtFinancing (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    loan_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    loan_interest_rate FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES CapitalStructureData(id)
);

CREATE TABLE EquityFinancing (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    equity_share DECIMAL(5, 2),
    share_price DECIMAL(7, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES CapitalStructureData(id)
);

CREATE TABLE CapitalStructureAnalysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    capital_structure VARCHAR(50),
    analysis_result TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES CapitalStructureData(id)
);

CREATE TABLE FinancialRatios (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    debt_to_equity_ratio DECIMAL(5, 2),
    current_ratio DECIMAL(5, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES CapitalStructureData(id)
);
